track.name: I Have a Dream
comments: i am an avid abba listener &fan. any song by abba especially the ones i grew up with ie. the winner takes it all-one of my all time favourites!
I have a dream, a fantasy, To help me through reality.  so well said

For every word their is a listener 
and probably my words don't suit your ears.
 So please don't accuse me of being ambiguous .
Que tema realmente "hermoso"
It is hard for me not to cry with this one...
just perfect.. what else is there to say?
Perfect!
I believe THEY'RE angels
Not embarrassed by this at all.Always on the verge of getting very emotional when we get to "I believe in Angels..." never listen to this in company
People who tag this as "disco" should be shot.
Lovely
Love me some ABBA!!!! Fantastic music for a Queen!!!! haaaaaaaaaaaaaaay!
Im dreaming tonight :-)
MMMMM so good ... Abba top notch ...(*_*)...

the ultimate quintessence of abba at its cheesiest  ("i believe in angels something good in everything i see i'll cross the stream i have a dream if you see the wonder of the fairy tale you can take the future even if you fail..la la la" ). In short: PERFECTION!!!!!!!
Good song.
I've had a glucose overdose just listening to this.
Classic pop songs from the lovable Swedes.
i believe in angels!
Love ABBA so glad to have lived in the time when they was hot HOT well they will live on and on (*_*)
